Pay Now Pay Later Anywhere
Use the Colendi Extension to pay, anywhere you shop online.You’ll never overpay again with Colendi! If you want to buy now and pay later on an online store that doesn’t natively support Colendi? You can open  Colendi partner mobile app  and generate a one-time card on the checkout page. It works like a regular Visa card, but it’ll offer you buy now pay later solution.
